What is ESG?

ESG stands for Environmental, Social, and Governance. This set of norms that heavily accentuates women empowerment and gender equality is utilized by investors to evaluate companies on numerous non-financial factors in order to identify growth opportunities and risks. Therefore, corporations are increasingly disclosing their ESG metrics to provide valuable data and insights on their environment, social and governance initiatives.
